author: donaldp
msg: Add a message that displayed when shutting down phoenix.

author: donaldp
msg: Made the shutdown() method public so that it can be called from launcher. Also added a better message to indicate shutdown.
Also fixed a bug where CliMain.main() would actually create a new CLIMain and work on that. This occured as main() used to be static in CLIMain.

author: donaldp
msg: Add a protected Shutdown() method that uses reflection to call shutdown on the frontend loaded.

author: bloritsch
msg: Restructure configuration so that it is backwards compatible
